name: Dungeon Of Block Path
description:
Legends say that somewhere there a strange dungeon full of blocks which you can flip by just power of single thought. It is believed there item hidden in there which causes this phenomenon and it may give those godly powers to owner. however watch out, this place may give strange powerful abilities, but it is still deadly maze full of traps! You are one of many who find that legendary place and you about to challenge it, to find golde%^&^$....

Controls:

AWSD - Move

Right click - Flip the block

Esc, P - Pause
